title: Thanks Riot, I got Low Priority queue for your game bug splatting 3 times
body: This is kinda stupid, why should i get punished for your game messing up. Its unfair that i have to keep waiting longer and longer due to LoL failing. Please Fix.

replies.body:
Such issues are typically native to your local client or your connection, rather than being inherent with the game.

First I'd recommend you try running a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair and then test in custom or bot games.

If you haven't already make sure both your **windows**, **DirectX** and **graphics card drivers** are up to date.

If that doesn't work try **reinstalling the game** with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

If all else fails, **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.
Thx, but none of that worked thx anyway
